page.title: 19Ecology
page.content: There are two man-made lochs in our block which attract all kinds of{water {fowl.}In 1952 Morton Lochs became Scotlands second nature reserve.We also have mud flats which are feeding grounds for ducks,swans,gulls and waders. Lucky Scalp is a good place for getting{mussels.}Some people used {mussels}for bait and others get them for the pearls inside.People used to dredge{mussels}in the Tay.In 1800 {mussels}were brought from the Seine in Paris to improve the local breed. {Welks}were gathered in baskets from "Tams Hole"between the Pile lighthouse and Lucky Scalp.The{welks were washed then bagged and sent off to the market for human consumption.
